title: Forest Ecosystem Stewardship Demonstration Act of 1995
content: Forest Ecosystem Stewardship Demonstration Act of 1995 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to establish and implement a Forest Service demonstration program of stewardship contracts to restore and preserve forest ecosystems and to sustain neighboring rural communities' economic viability. Requires Local Forest Stewardship Councils to be established for each National Forest System offering stewardship contracts.
